title: CM - designate Chandrababu Naidu postpones oath ceremony to June 12 – Here Why
body_text:
CM-designate Chandrababu Naidu postpones oath ceremony to June 12 – Here’s Why
Telugu Desam Party (TDP) chief N Chandrababu Naidu's swearing-in ceremony as the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh has been postponed to June 12, allowing him to attend caretaker Prime Minister Narendra Modi's swearing-in ceremony in New Delhi on June 8.
